Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-grey pottery slightly ribbed vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse, the interior bears traces of a brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of a black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394967) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394967)
